title: WCAS ASTRON 448-0-1 Interstellar Gas & Radiation Processes

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute Building (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-215, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of interstellar gas, absorption and emission lines, synchrotron radiation, excitation of atoms and molecules, shocks, supernova remnants, gravitational collapse, and protostars.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: One midterm, one final and weekly homework assignment

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Physics of the Interstellar and Intergalactic Medium
by Bruce T. Draine
Princeton University Press
ISBN: 9780691122144

subject: ASTRON
